meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #827.

td.p: Harry Weisberger, an aerospace writer from Phoenix, Arizona
Cheryl van Middlesworth, a housewife from Cerritos, California (whose 3-day cash winnings total $28,700)

tr.td: SCOTLAND
SOCCER
STAGE NAMES
LOVE & MARRIAGE
3-LETTER WORDS
ART

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
